page.title: 06Our School Helping Others
page.content: Every year at the Harvest Festival celebration,Marpool Primary School helps to collect food for the old people. Cars are filled with the food and are delivered to old peoples' houses. Another appeal we did was for the Ethiopians. We saw terrible pictures coming from Ethiopia about children and adults starving. Our school helped by asking children to bring little contributions to the appeal. One hundred and fifty pounds was raised.We also collected for the National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children. So far we have raised twelve pounds and seventy five pence.
